sentences.english: But now sponsors and advertisers are growing wary of association with a sport riven with drug abuse.
sentences.chinese: 现在赞助商和广告主终于对环法的药物滥用发难了。

sentences.english: He walked to the door and opened it, prepared to accost an intruder with righteous indignation.
sentences.chinese: 他走上前去开门，义愤填膺地想向闯入者发难。

sentences.english: The anti-Thaksin crowd, mobilised as the People’s Alliance for Democracy (PAD) was hostile.
sentences.chinese: 反他信的“人民民主联盟”处处发难。

sentences.english: Dried tangerine or orange peel to jade Buddhas name to Yin Xinyue, is nine ye clever resolve.
sentences.chinese: 陈皮欲以玉佛为名向尹新月发难，被解九爷巧妙化解。

sentences.english: Zhao Minggui hair in order to compete with rivals cloud challenged on bones.
sentences.chinese: 赵明贵为了跟竞争对手程云发发难就对鱼刺开脱。
